attributes.action: Ban 'Let Him Die' Chant at football games
attributes.additional_details:
The government have the power to stop things being legal, and this is where they should use their power to good use.

Following the incident at White Hart Lane on 17th March 2012, when Fabrice Muamba collapsed on the pitch, I propose that the chant 'let him die' should never be able to be sung again - it shows disrespect and this incident has made us all aware of it.
